name: Sages Of Kaboom
description:
This game basically is a schmup with a retro vibe in it and some funny additions. The story takes place in Kaboom, a once peaceful land which now is under attack by the evil forces of the Machinedrillers led by the Supreme Commander. So, you are Sage1, the best pilot of the Air Force of Kaboom and you fight all alone the evil forces emerging into his land, with combat taking place from the skies, through forests and even the outer space!!! Brace yourself for an adventure you'll never forget!!!

The main features of this game are intense aerial combat, with a variety of enemies and enormous, challenging bosses. Also, the player has power ups like orbitals, point coins and hearts for extra lives.

This game can be played only with a keyboard and mouse.
